data.name: GridBagConstraint_HorizontalAlignment_Property
data.value: Horizontal alignment of the item within its logical cell.

data.name: GridBagConstraint_Column_Property
data.value:
Column and Row define where the layout item will be placed in the virtual grid of the grid-bag layout. Column specifies the location horizontally while specifies the location vertically. These locations are the coordinates of the cells in the virtual grid that the grid-bag layout represents.

The leftmost cell has Column of 0. The constant Relative specifies that the item be placed just to the right of the item that was added to the layout manager just before this item was added.

The default value is Relative. Column should be a non-negative value.

data.name: GridBagConstraint_ColumnSpan_Property
data.value: Specifies the number of cells this item will span horizontally. The constant Remainder specifies that this item be the last one in the row and thus occupy remaining space.

data.name: GridBagConstraint_ColumnWeight_Property
data.value: Indicates how the extra horizontal space will be distributed among items. Default value is 0.0. Higher values give higher priority. The weight of the column in the virtual grid the grid-bag layout represents is the maximum ColumnWeight of all the items in the row.

data.name: GridBagConstraint_Margin_Property
data.value: Indicates the padding around the layout item.

data.name: GridBagConstraint_Row_Property
data.value:
Column and Row define where the layout item will be placed in the virtual grid of the grid-bag layout. Column specifies the location horizontally while specifies the location vertically. These locations are the coordinates of the cells in the virtual grid that the grid-bag layout represents.

The topmost cell has Row of 0. The constant Relative specifies that the item be placed just below the item that was added to the layout manager just before this item was added.

The default value is Relative. Row should be a non-negative value.

data.name: GridBagConstraint_RowSpan_Property
data.value: Specifies the number of cells this item will span vertically. The constant Remainder specifies that this item be the last one in the column and thus occupy remaining space.

data.name: GridBagConstraint_RowWeight_Property
data.value: Indicates how the extra vertical space will be distributed among items. Default value is 0.0. Higher values give higher priority. The weight of the column in the virtual grid the grid-bag layout represents is the maximum RowWeight of all the items in the column.

data.name: GridBagConstraint_VerticalAlignment_Property
data.value: Vertical alignment of the item within its logical cell.

data.name: GridBagLayoutItemDimensions_Bounds_Property
data.value: Item bounds relative to the container's bounds.

data.name: GridBagLayoutItemDimensions_Column_Property
data.value: Returns the Column of the item.

data.name: GridBagLayoutItemDimensions_ColumnSpan_Property
data.value: Returns the ColumnSpan of the item.

data.name: GridBagLayoutItemDimensions_Row_Property
data.value: Returns the Row of the item.

data.name: GridBagLayoutItemDimensions_RowSpan_Property
data.value: Retruns the RowSpan of the item.

data.name: GridBagLayoutItemDimensionsCollection_ColumnDims_Property
data.value: For Internal use. Column coordinates relative to left of the container rect. These can be modified freely without effecting the layout.

data.name: GridBagLayoutItemDimensionsCollection_MaximumSize_Property
data.value: Maximum size of the layout.

data.name: GridBagLayoutItemDimensionsCollection_MinimumSize_Property
data.value: Minimum size of the layout.

data.name: GridBagLayoutItemDimensionsCollection_PreferredSize_Property
data.value: Preferred size of the layout.

data.name: GridBagLayoutItemDimensionsCollection_RowDims_Property
data.value: For Internal use. Row coordinates relative to top of the container rect. These can be modified freely without effecting the layout.

data.name: GridBagLayoutManager_ColumnWeights_Property
data.value: Returns the column weights of the gridbag layout. You can change them however they get recalculated once the layout is invalidated. Layout also gets invalidated whenever a layout item is added or removed.

data.name: GridBagLayoutManager_ColumnWidths_Property
data.value: Returns the preferred column widths of the gridbag layout. You can change them however they get recalculated once the layout is invalidated. Layout also gets invalidated whenever a layout item is added or removed.

data.name: GridBagLayoutManager_ExpandToFitHeight_Property
data.value: Indicates whether to proportionally expand or shrink the heights of all the items to fit the layout rect. This would only get applied if all the items had 0.0 rowWeight's.

data.name: GridBagLayoutManager_ExpandToFitWidth_Property
data.value: Indicates whether to proportionally expand or shrink the widths of all the items to fit the layout rect. This would only get applied if all the items had 0.0 columnWeight's.

data.name: GridBagLayoutManager_ShrinkToFitHeight_Property
data.value: Indicates whether to shrink or not shrink the items' heights to fit the available layout area. Overrides the behavior of Infragistics.Controls.Layouts.Primitives.GridBagLayoutManager.ExpandToFitHeight property.

data.name: GridBagLayoutManager_ShrinkToFitWidth_Property
data.value: Indicates whether to shrink or not shrink the items' widths to fit the available layout area. Overrides the behavior of Infragistics.Controls.Layouts.Primitives.GridBagLayoutManager.ExpandToFitWidth property.

data.name: GridBagLayoutManager_HorizontalContentAlignment_Property
data.value: Specifies where the contents are to be positioned horizontally if there is extra width available.

data.name: GridBagLayoutManager_VerticalContentAlignment_Property
data.value: Specifies where the contents are to be positioned vertically if there is extra height available.

data.name: GridBagLayoutManager_IncludeMarginInPositionRect_Property
data.value: Indicates whether to include layout item margins in the rect that's specified in when the layout item is positioned via PositionItem call on the container. This mirrors the fact that UIElement's Arrange call takes a rect that includes the element's margins.

data.name: GridBagLayoutManager_InterItemSpacingHorizontal_Property
data.value: Specifies the horizontal spacing between each item.

data.name: GridBagLayoutManager_InterItemSpacingVertical_Property
data.value: Specifies the vertical spacing between each item.

data.name: GridBagLayoutManager_LayoutMode_Property
data.value: Internal property.

data.name: GridBagLayoutManager_PreferredSizeIncludesMargin_Property
data.value: Indicates that the preferred size provided by layout items include their margins. This mirrors DesiredSize of UIElement which includes its margins. However note that MinimumSize and MaximumSize do not include the margins, just like the UIElement.

data.name: GridBagLayoutManager_RowHeights_Property
data.value: Returns the preferred row heights of the gridbag layout. You can change them however they get recalculated once the layout is invalidated. Layout also gets invalidated whenever a layout item is added or removed.

data.name: GridBagLayoutManager_RowWeights_Property
data.value: Returns the row weights of the gridbag layout. You can change them however they get recalculated once the layout is invalidated. Layout also gets invalidated whenever a layout item is added or removed.
